title: 4 Years After Fukushima, How Is The Nuclear Industry Faring?
teaser: As Japan marks the anniversary of the nuclear disaster, we check in with a defender of nuclear energy about the state of the industry.
contentencoded:
Four years after a tsunami struck Japan and caused the Fukushima nuclear reactor disaster, Here & Now’s Robin Young checks in with a defender of nuclear energy about the state of the industry. Jonathan Cobb is an adviser at the World Nuclear Association, a London-based organization representing nuclear professionals.

Guest

  • Jonathan Cobb, adviser on climate change at the World Nuclear Association. He tweets @WNAJonathanCobb.
